                       int x2,

        Swaps the Lokums at (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-coordinate of the first Lokum.
        y1 - The y-coordinate of the first Lokum.
        x2 - The x-coordinate of the second Lokum.
        y2 - The y-coordinate of the second Lokum.

      • checkTriples

        public int checkTriples()
        Checks for triples. Then adds those Lokums to deleteList, and adds the specialLokum to be created to createList.
        Returns:
        Number of triples found.

      • checkQuads

        public int checkQuads()
        Checks for quadruples. Then adds those Lokums to deleteList, and adds the specialLokum to be created to createList.
        Returns:
        Number of quadruples found.

        Checks for quintuples. Then adds those Lokums to deleteList, and adds the specialLokum to be created to createList.
        Returns:
        Number of quintuples found.
